title: Halberd
data:
{{version030}} {{weapon |name = Halberd |cost = ? |weight = ? |skill = Polearms |damage = 13 |accuracy = -3 |basedelay = 15 (150%) |mindelay = 7 at skill 16 |hands = 2H |size = Large |damtype = Chopping |ranged = No |acquirement = 2 }} {{flavour|A polearm consisting of an axe blade topped with a spike, mounted on a long shaft. ---- "And Diarmid oh, Diarmid he perished in the strife;
His head it was spiked upon a halberd high;
His colours they were trampled: he had no chance at life
If the Lord God Himself stood by!-
Och ochone!"
-James Clarence Mangan, _A Farewell to Patrick Sarsfield, Earl of Lucan_, ca. 1840}} {{crawlquote|This weapon falls into the [[Polearms]] category. It is a two handed weapon.}} The '''halberd''' is a two-handed polearm, the weakest but fastest of the bunch. It's a pretty decent weapon for both damage and speed when you haven't found a [[shield]], but you should upgrade to a one-hander or [[glaive]] once you have trained some more skill. As a chopping weapon, it'll cut off [[hydra]] heads. It is also too large for [[kobold]]s and [[spriggan]]s to use at all. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[File:Halberd1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[File:Halberd2.png]] |- | '''Artifact''' || [[File:Halberd3.png]] |} {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || [[Unrandarts]] |- | '''[[Finisher]]''' || [[File:Scythe finisher.png]] |- | '''[[Scythe of Curses]]''' || [[File:Scythe of curses.png]] |} ==History== *Prior to [[0.29]], [[scythe]]s had their own base type instead of being based off halberds. *Prior to [[0.10]], these lacked innate [[reaching]] and had a higher base delay.
